channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Safety

item.title: Nepal Safety Centre Pvt. Ltd
item.description: Nepal Safety Centre Pvt. Ltd. is Nepal's first safety solutions centre with the aim of making people aware regarding various safety issues either in industry, organization, society or personal life. Nepal Safety Centre is committed to minimize the number of deaths & disability inside the country or abroad as a result of health and safety failures. Nepal Safety Centre is the voice of the profession, organization, society & individual.
item.dc:creator: superadmin
